keyword: how many calories in mcdonalds small fries
title: How Many Calories in McDonald's Small Fries?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in McDonald's small fries (about 230 kcal), plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in McDonald's Small Fries?
assumptions: McDonald's small order french fries (approx. 71g), fried in vegetable oil blend, standard preparation per official nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and customizations; values based on U.S. standard. Check McDonald's app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: A small serving of McDonald's fries contains about 230 calories and 29g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Air-fried homemade version (similar size, no oil)

faqs.q: How many calories in McDonald's small fries?
What are the carbs in McDonald's small fries?
faqs.a: About 29g total carbs, including 1.4g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a small McDonald's fries?
faqs.a: 11g total fat, with 1.5g saturated fat and 0g trans fat.

faqs.q: Are McDonald's small fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 160mg sodium per small serving.

faqs.q: How does small compare to medium McDonald's fries calories?
faqs.a: Medium has about 340 calories; small is lower at 230.
